core

Class Investment

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Investment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutualFund, Stock

    public class Investment
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class to represent an investment instance.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Investment()
      Default constructor creates an empty investment with quantity=0 and price=0.0$
      Investment(java.lang.String symbol, java.lang.String name)
      Creates an investment with quantity=0 and price=0.0$
      Investment(java.lang.String symbol, java.lang.String name, int quantity, int price)
      Creates an investment
